Name: Beija Flor Cocktail
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of banana slice on rim.
Review: Sharp and quite dry but with a banana twang. Depending on your taste and banana liqueur, you may want to add a splash more liqueur or even sugar syrup.
Nutrition: One serving of Beija Flor Cocktail contains 202 calories
